name: Noisy Communications
tag_list: pr, marketing, social-media, technology, games, brighton, advertising, video-games
overview:
Noisy Communications is a an integrated PR, communications and social media agency run by Helen Jones who has more than 15 years experience in PR and communications initially gained in financial services and most recently spent nurturing and loving video games and bringing them to the masses.

At Noisy, we want to do things differently, we want to be part of your team so if you’d like us to come and sit in your office, work in your restaurant or sell your products we will (but we won’t be offended if you don’t). We’ll do anything to understand you better. We believe that to be effective we must really live your business objectives otherwise we’re just that additional expense coming off your bottom line. And we want to help you increase your profits.

We’re also passionate about supporting our local industries, especially game developers and digital businesses in Brighton.

So if you need a bit of help or a lot of help, we can help. Our services are flexible and designed to suit you on an hourly, weekly, monthly, project or retainer basis – we can find a relationship that suits your needs.
